previewArticle.title: South Korea vs. Algeria: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group H Preview

recapArticle.title: South Korea 2, Algeria 4: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group H Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Foul by Park Chu-Young (South Korea).
Aissa Mandi (Algeria) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Cathie Tulk
timelineItems.text: #WorldCup After some deliberation, I'm nodding towards Korea.

timelineItems.name: Jarika A. Johnson
timelineItems.text: Algeria looks formidable today. #algvskor #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Sports outlaws

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: #USMNT-Portugal pregame now on ESPN. First meeting since a U.S. 3-2 win at the 2002 #WorldCup.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage plan: NED-CHI: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN AUS-ESP: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN2 CRO-MEX: 3:30 ET, ESPN CMR-BRA: 3:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: #USMNT has conceded seven goals in the first five minutes of #WorldCup games, most by any team in WC history.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 3 - #NED have won three of the last four #WorldCup games in which they have gone behind. Warriors.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: David Villa extends his Spanish records with his 59th int'l goal and his 9th #WorldCup goal.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Varela's goal (90'+4:33) is the latest recorded #WorldCup goal in a regulation game.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Neymar puts Brazil up 1-0 with the 100th goal of this #WorldCup.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 4 - Neymar has now scored four times in three matches at the 2014 #WorldCup and eight times in his last six for #BRA. Leader.

timelineItems.name: Matheus Harb

Lee Keun-Ho (South Korea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Mehdi Lacen (Algeria).
Koo Ja-Cheol (South Korea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sofiane Feghouli (Algeria).

timelineItems.name: اخر اخبار كرة القدم
timelineItems.text: صورة من مباراة الجزائر وكوريا http://t.co/8aOITlcrZe #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: اخر اخبار كرة القدم
timelineItems.text: صورة من مباراة الجزائر وكوريا http://t.co/8aOITlcrZe #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: SADEK
timelineItems.text: no doubt, this is the best #WorldCup tournament since 1998. Surprising and Entertaining.

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Islam Slimani (Algeria) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Dan Toner
timelineItems.text: Probably one of the best world cups ever for standard of football played. And the worst for hairstyles! Some bad ones to date #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Lee Keun-Ho (South Korea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Dan Hilton
timelineItems.text: #KOR player helping #ALG player while down by 2 & ball still in play - very sporting #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Carl Medjani (Algeria).
Kim Shin-Wook (South Korea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Tim Coyne
timelineItems.text: Huge set piece coming here for #KOR #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Son Heung-Min (South Korea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Arko Bhattacharya
timelineItems.text: Just 5 minutes and added time to go. What can Korea do? #algvskor #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Ji Dong-Won (South Korea) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Kim Shin-Wook with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: babbe nu sihari
timelineItems.text: the #KOR team of 2002 will be cringing at this team. #worldcup

timelineItems.name: Michael McCaul
timelineItems.text: Algerian fans are now believing. Hope they do make the last 16. Would be an amazing achievement #KORvsALG #WorldCup #Brasil2014 #twitter92

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Islam Slimani (Algeria) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Abdelmoumene Djabou with a cross following a corner.
Foul by Ji Dong-Won (South Korea).
Carl Medjani (Algeria) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Sang Ik
timelineItems.text: Well, at least #KORALG is fun. Son is #KOR best player. Just we have zero support & defense. #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  South Korea. Conceded by Essaïd Belkalem.
Aissa Mandi (Algeria) wins a free kick on the right wing.

Second Half ends, South Korea 2, Algeria 4.
